verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] resurrecting his rallying cry that Mexico will pay for his proposed border wall , despite sensitive ongoing negotiations over the future of a key North American trade deal .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: resurrecting] [ARG1: his rallying cry that Mexico will pay for his proposed border wall] , [ARGM-ADV: despite sensitive ongoing negotiations over the future of a key North American trade deal] .

President Donald Trump is resurrecting his rallying cry that Mexico [V: will] pay for his proposed border wall , despite sensitive ongoing negotiations over the future of a key North American trade deal .

President Donald Trump is resurrecting his rallying cry that [ARG0: Mexico] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: pay] [ARG3: for his proposed border wall] , [ARGM-ADV: despite sensitive ongoing negotiations over the future of a key North American trade deal] .

President Donald Trump is resurrecting his rallying cry that Mexico will pay for his [V: proposed] [ARG1: border wall] , despite sensitive ongoing negotiations over the future of a key North American trade deal .
